Description.SourceString: Elemental terrain has an effect when Heroes and monsters take an action. If the character is the same element as the terrain, then the terrain heals the character with every action. If the terrain is a different element, it damages the character with each action. Terrain deals elemental damage, so it's especially dangerous to be on terrain that has an elemental advantage against the character.
